column4: pidgin automatically shuts down as soon as i connect to dalnet #buddhism
currently using xchat to chat here
can you open a terminal, type in pidgin and try to connect #buddhism and then pastebin what's printed in the terminal please
how would i connect to a dalnet server and #buddhism channel via terminal?
err by doing pidgin in the terminal pidgin should pop up
i did it and this is what i got in the terminal - /msg NickServ@services.dal.net IDENTIF
Exiting because another libpurple client is already running
okay, can you please close all your existing pidgin instances first
i will close again and re-try
ok, will kill all pidgin and try again
just happened when i tried to join another channel on dalnet
same thing happens when i join any channel
